    • deleteContent

      @RequestMapping(method=DELETE, value="/content/{content_id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteContent(@PathVariable("content_id") String contentId)
      DELETE /content/{content_id} : Delete a specific piece of content.
      Parameters:
      contentId - (required)
      Returns:
      Content deleted successfully. (status code 200) or Bad request. Invalid or missing parameters. (status code 400) or Unauthorized. Invalid authentication provided. (status code 401) or Forbidden. Access to delete the content is denied. (status code 403) or Content not found. (status code 404) or Too many requests. Rate limit exceeded. (status code 429)

    • getAllContentByUserId

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, value="/content", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ContentListResponseDto> getAllContentByUserId(@Valid @RequestParam(value="filter",required=false) @Valid Optional<String> filter)
      GET /content : List all user content with optional filters.
      Parameters:
      filter - Filter content (e.g., by date or platform). (optional)
      Returns:
      List of content retrieved successfully. (status code 200) or Bad request. Invalid filter parameters. (status code 400) or No content found for the given filters. (status code 404) or Too many requests. Rate limit exceeded. (status code 429) or Service unavailable. The system is under maintenance or overloaded. (status code 503)

    • sendCollaborationInvitations

      @RequestMapping(method=POST, value="/content/invite/{content_id}", consumes="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> sendCollaborationInvitations(@PathVariable("content_id") String contentId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid CollaborationRequestDto collaborationRequestDto)
      POST /content/invite/{content_id} : Invite users to collaborate on content.
      Parameters:
      contentId - (required)
      collaborationRequestDto - (required)
      Returns:
      Invitation sent successfully. (status code 200) or Bad request. The input is invalid or missing required fields. (status code 400) or Content not found. The specified content ID does not exist. (status code 404) or Conflict. Invitation already exists for the user. (status code 409)

    • updatePendingInvitesForContentById

      @RequestMapping(method=PATCH, value="/content/invite/{content_id}", consumes="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updatePendingInvitesForContentById(@PathVariable("content_id") String contentId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid CollaborationActionResponseDto collaborationActionResponseDto)
      PATCH /content/invite/{content_id} : Accept or decline invitations. The user can accept or decline content request invitation. Need to consider whether to make a new endpoint for accept/decline invitations and use this endpoint for modifying access control instead. Reference of Google Zanziber can be used for access control.
      Parameters:
      contentId - (required)
      collaborationActionResponseDto - (required)
      Returns:
      Invitation status updated. (status code 200) or Bad request. The action is invalid or the request is malformed. (status code 400) or Invitation not found. No invitation for the specified content ID. (status code 404) or Conflict. The action cannot be performed due to a conflict in the invitation status. (status code 409)
